title: Bulwark FR Men's Straight Fit Jean with Stretch
description: CAT2 AR/FR protection and NFPA 2112 compliant. Arc Rating ATPV 15 cal/cm2.
Two patch spade shaped hip pockets and scoop front pockets
One-piece waistband with concealed, metal button closure (metal is not exposed to skin)

This stretch denim jean fits like your weekend jeans and moves with you while you work. It sits just below your waist with a straight leg fit. These flame-resistant jeans feature a soft pre-wash and sanded fabric for a modern look, while providing CAT2 AR/FR protection and NFPA® 2112 compliance. It has a one-piece waistband with metal button closure. The metal button is not exposed to your skin.
